recent_news: NOA Labs (Berlin/Shenzhen) is a hardware product design, engineering, and mass production company with 800+ completed projects
Alex Murawski is Y-Combinator and HAX alumni — connected to global hardware and deep tech accelerator networks
NOA Labs works with 300+ customers across 60+ countries; startup clients have raised $10M+ on crowdfunding
Co-founder at Makeblock, Senic, and nexpaq — serial deep tech entrepreneur
enrichment_data.outreach_angle: Alex's NOA Labs is a hardware product development house — relevant for Kavach AI's edge box hardware development. Kavach AI needs a reliable hardware partner to produce the edge box device for deployment at Indian and Swiss sites. NOA Labs has the manufacturing connections in Shenzhen and the engineering team. Reach out: 'Alex — following up from December. I am building Kavach AI, an edge-AI security monitoring platform that needs a hardware partner for the edge box device (IP cameras + edge compute). Given NOA Labs' track record with hardware startups, I would love to explore whether you could help us prototype and manufacture. 15-minute call?' Timeline: this month.
